There are many ways you can start your search for home insurance, including:

1. Ask your mortgage lender: If you have a mortgage on your new home, your lender may require that you get home insurance coverage. They may even have recommendations for insurance companies that they have worked with in the past. 2. Ask friends and family: Reach out to friends and family members who have recently purchased a home and ask them for recommendations on insurance companies they have used and liked. 3. Search online: There are many comparison websites and review websites that allow you to compare different insurance companies and read reviews from other customers. Some popular options include Policygenius, Insurify, and Nerdwallet. 4. Contact Insurance Companies: Contact insurance companies directly and ask for quotes or information about their policies. Many insurers will allow you to request a quote online, and some even have online chat representatives to assist you. Remember, it is always a good idea to get quotes from multiple insurance companies to ensure you're getting the best coverage at the most appropriate price.
